text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, I just thought it was a 
bit… disappointing, is all.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This may be the last time I'll be 
Bakushin-ing in short distances.

If she's going to say something like
that… Maybe she's starting to find the
shorter distances more appealing…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Everyone in the audience will be 
inconsolable!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There must be people who were born just 
to see this divine speed that wins every 
short distance race by a huuuge margin.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But, this is a necessary evil! 
The class president, for the sake of 
everyone…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The least I can do is go out with
a bang!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Let's leave everyone with a great
victory to show for it!
